programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Australian Alps
programme.desc: It may come as a surprise to non-Australians that the island continent renowned for its flat plains and searing deserts has snow-capped mountains at all.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Ethiopia: Land of Extremes
programme.desc: Landlocked and surrounded by five countries, Ethiopia is one of east Africa's forgotten lands. Seemingly passive deserts in fact seethe with fire, and cloud-piercing peaks shield a secret Eden of canyons and cliff-tops teeming with life.

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Arctic Ocean: The Frozen Sea
programme.desc: The film follows a year in the High Arctic, where life is exceptionally entwined with the seasons. Journey to the Arctic where in winter, the sun doesn't rise for months on end, but in the summer thaws out in an explosion of life.

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Taiga: The Frozen Forest
programme.desc: Containing one third of the world's trees, the frozen forests of the Taiga are the lungs of the planet. This great forest spans across shores of the Pacific, sheltering some of the Earth's most majestic animals, and some of its most secretive.

programme.title: Wildest India: Western Ghats: Monsoon Mountains
programme.desc: See how the Himalayas run across 2,500km of north India.The Himalayas' highlands offer little direct refuge to humans. /Then, learn about the western Ghats. A spine of mountains that lay claim to being one of the most bio-diverse places in the world.

programme.title: Building Britain's Canals: Grand Union Canal
programme.desc: The canal challenged the great engineering minds of its time.

programme.title: Building Britain's Canals: Leeds & Liverpool Canal
programme.desc: This canal turned Liverpool into the busiest port on Earth.

programme.title: Building Britain's Canals: Kennet and Avon
programme.desc: Dan Jones examines the Kennet and Avon canal.

programme.title: Concorde: Part One
programme.desc: How Concorde became the world's only supersonic airliner.

programme.title: Concorde: Part Two
programme.desc: By the early 1980s, Concorde was admired the world over.

programme.title: London: 2000 Years Of History
programme.desc: Dan Jones discovers the ruins of Roman Londinium.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 28
programme.desc: Everyone is back at Kitchen Headquarters and tonight's challenge requires the teams to prepare a seafood banquet fit for kings and the guests of honour are the most important people they will ever cook for - surprise VIPs.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 29
programme.desc: Tonight, it's an episode full of surprise tests and temptations. First up, teams begin to cook with their most difficult ingredients used yet, but soon the tables are turned.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 30
programme.desc: Simon & Meg vs. Steve & Helen. National pride is on the line as two teams go head to head in the sudden death cook-off. It's neck and neck in the closest battle so far. After a nail-bitingly close contest, one team will be eliminated.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 31
programme.desc: The judges have a shock announcement that shakes things up in the competition. In another surprise twist, the teams will face their harshest critics yet with the arrival of a jury. The teams are left dumbfounded when they see who's coming to dinner.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 32
programme.desc: The remaining teams will battle it out in an all-in cook-off. The jury have their knives out again and together with the judges will determine tonight's lowest scoring teams.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Wasted Youth
programme.desc: When teenagers are driven to kill, their victims are but the first to fall. In three such cases, the families of the killers, as well as their communities, become the victims of violent crime.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Deadly Chemistry
programme.desc: The show examines cases of poison and deadly chemistry and shows how forensic experts are solving mysterious deaths today and from the past.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Blood Money
programme.desc: Some people murder for love. But these killers did it for the money. When greed is the motive, investigators must make every clue pay off.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Broken Trust
programme.desc: A New York homebuyer gets more than he bargained for when a house inspection turns up a mummified corpse. For decades, the crime had gone undiscovered. The victim unmissed, and the killer unpunished.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Three hairs microscopic fibers a common trash bag ripped from a roll. Seemingly small and insignificant clues become a victim's silent witness.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The two finalists must work with an architect to design restaurant spaces for their final dinner service competition.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The two remaining contestants compete in the final dinner service; the winner of the head chef job in Atlantic City is chosen.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay announces that the 16 contestants must successfully complete the opening dinner service, but he may be forced to eat his words.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The team with the most properly cooked eggs wins a helicopter tour of Los Angeles; when a chef gets into an argument with Ramsay, it threatens a team.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The cheerleaders and members of the marching band from the University of Southern California have their lunch prepared by the remaining contestants.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The next challenge has an element of the unknown to it, as the contestants must create dishes using ingredients chosen by the roll of a die.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms an old 1931 Ford jalopy into a street burning hot rod and attempts to bring back one of his wildest creations.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel digs out an old 1960’s dune buggy and brings it back to life with a modern twist.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms a beat?up 1955 Oldsmobile into a classic custom. Part 1 of 2

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel continues the transformation of a beat up '55 Oldsmobile into a classic custom and takes on a Henry J chop top. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel makes the ultimate shop van out of a 1949 International milk truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms a 1948 Packard into a street cruising led sled.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Banks of the Lethe
programme.desc: A black hole allows Dylan to communicate with his former fiancée, 300 years in the past.

programme.title: Andromeda: A Rose in the Ashes
programme.desc: Dylan is imprisoned on a prison planet and must stage an escape as his crew tries to stage their own rescue.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Castalians board the Andromeda to finalize the charter for the New Commonwealth. When the leader is discovered dead, Tyr is the main suspect.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka learns that her father's former business partner deals in a highly addictive drug called F lash.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The Andromeda discovers her sister ship, the Pax Magellanic. The crew aboard Pax is 300 years old, but have not aged a day.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Vanishing Point
programme.desc: In 2003, 32-year-old mother of three Sara Neithe vanished from the Hauraki Plains. Neither Sara nor her car have been seen since. Police suspect that Sara has been murdered but without a crime scene, they have been unable to advance the case.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: “Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to connect with the spirit of murdered Christchurch scrap-metal dealer, John Reynolds, to discover his killer and reveal the truth surrounding the violent attack.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Lost Soul
programme.desc: In 1985, 25-year-old Luana 'La Verne' Williams disappeared from her Tauranga home. Eight years later her disappearance was upgraged to a murder enquiry. Her body has never been found.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: In Too Deep
programme.desc: In 1999, Kiwi engineer Aaron Hopa and his English colleague Robert Glazzard were murdered on board a survey ship in the Persian Gulf in.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: 54 year old Simon Buis was savagely beaten and kicked to death in an Auckland park in 1980 by persons unknown. To this day, his killers have evaded capture.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Devil Inside: John Ernest Cribb
programme.desc: A chilling investigation of John Ernest Cribb, who on August 11, 1978 broke into the home of the Connell's. On a winter’s afternoon, Valda Connell and her four-year-old son Damien arrived home after having collected ten-year-old Sally from school.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Butchered Boys
programme.desc: This episode revisits Adelaide's notorious Adelaide Family Murders case, where six young Adelaide men were murdered during the 1970s and '80s. The victims were found in random locations throughout the state, their bodies neatly cut into pieces.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Cop Killer: The Winchester Assassination
programme.desc: The highest ranking police officer in Australia to be murdered, Assistant Federal Police Commissioner Colin Winchester was shot twice in the head at point blank range as he was getting out of his car outside his Deakin home on 10 January 1989.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Body in the Sports Bag
programme.desc: A young Sydney man was found guilty of strangling his ex-girlfriend and stuffing the teenager's body in a cricket bag.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: A Killer Amongst Us: The Norfolk Island Murder
programme.desc: On Easter Sunday 2002, on sleepy Norfolk Island in the south west Pacific, the body of 29-year-old Janelle Patton was found lying in an open field.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Ever After
programme.desc: Alex and Stevie's big day is finally here! Will Alex get out of jail in time for the service? Alex's sister tries to ruin the wedding and take control of Killarney while Rose gives Stevie a pre-wedding makeover - with disastrous results.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Grace Under Fire
programme.desc: Grace is convinced she has cursed Drovers Run when a series of bizarre plagues hit the farm. It's pride versus prejudice when Grace locks horns with a rich new neighbour, Heath Barrett.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Gift Horse
programme.desc: Grace is determined to resist Heath's charms - but for how long? Patrick suffers a life-threatening reaction when bitten by a lizard. Grace questions her future on Drovers Run when her best friend dies suddenly.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Hot Water
programme.desc: Grace and Kate are taken hostage by a bankrupt farmer. Moira has a premonition that someone will be shot by the gunman - but who will it be? When the bank refuses credit to Drovers Run, Grace accepts a secret loan from Ashleigh.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Leaving The Nest
programme.desc: Stevie's daughter Rose suffers a tragic farm accident, which will change the lives of everyone on Drovers Run. Grace takes desperate measures to repay her secret loan to Ashleigh.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Spark From Heaven
programme.desc: A guardian angel visits Drovers Run to make the girls' dreams come true. Rose returns from hospital in a wheelchair and is involved in a freak car crash.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Michael Sneyd, CEO of mega resort business Skyline International Development, goes undercover to get creative with the employees at the foot of the chain and take their ideas to new heights.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive “behind the scenes” look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Fort Henry
programme.desc: This week, TAPS is called in to investigate the Fort Henry, where it once served as a cornerstone for Canada's military defense and execution site.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Haunted By Heroes
programme.desc: For Grant's second to last case with Ghost Hunters, TAPS revisits one of Grant's favorite locations, Mt. Washington, in New Hampshire. Last time TAPS was here, they caught one of the best EVP's ever.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Knights of the Living Dead
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Worcester, Massachusetts to investigate the Higgins Armory, the only armory in the western hemisphere devoted to arms and armor.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Glimmer Men
programme.desc: TAPS heads to Quincy, Massachusetts to investigate the unexplainable paranormal events that are haunting a 716 foot long ship.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Heir Apparition
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Hampton Falls, New Hampshire to investigate the Governors Mansion, a property Steve has investigated before with a local team.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Three's Company
programme.desc: This fugitive is hard to pin down in Honolulu's downtown district, moving from hostel to hotel to apartment high-rise. But as the hunt evolves, Dog discovers that this alleged burglar isn't the only family member wanted by the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Strip Search
programme.desc: When a stripper goes on the lam, Dog has to bring her in. It's a tough job but somebody has to do it. Thankfully for the team, Lady Luck is presiding over the posse tonight.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secret Places
programme.desc: When Leland learns that one of his clients with a reputation for stealing has lost her co-signer and could be ready to run, Dog and the crew hop a plane to the Big Island.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Wrong Turn
programme.desc: Dog's target today seems to have a taste for drugs and a record of reckless driving. The hunt has deep emotional resonance for the team because today is the anniversary of the fatal car accident of Dog's daughter Barbara Katie.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Easy Rider
programme.desc: What looks like a routine pick-up turns into a complicated case of betrayal, deceit, as well as quality nail care as Dog and company track down a fugitive alleged to be an abusive boyfriend with one too many friends in his close knit community.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Midnight Run
programme.desc: This fugitive has a bad reputation and a knack for running from the law. The pursuit has Dog and team traveling through an urban dystopia of suspicion, false leads and mistrust.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Burger Commander
programme.desc: After visiting a popular burger restaurant, Willie and Jase get into a debate over which of them cooks the best burger, prompting them to challenge one another to a cooking contest.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: G.I. Si
programme.desc: When Willie and Jase argue over an old G.I. Joe toy, it leads them into a debate over who would make a better soldier. To settle the score, Willie and Jase head out to the woods with their friends and children for a paintball match.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jase and the Argonauts
programme.desc: When Willie gets a soft serve machine for himself, he tells the guys they can't use it until they're done working. But when Jase thinks this is unfair, he takes matters into his own hands and finds a better object to use as motivation.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fowl Playhouse
programme.desc: When Jase finds out Jep is planning to buy his kids a fancy playhouse from a catalogue, he and the guys decide to build one for Jep themselves. But the playhouse ends up looking more like a military-style duck blind.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Big LeCOWski
programme.desc: When Sadie spends the day at Duck Commander for a school project, the guys try to show her the ins-and-outs of how a successful company works. But when Willie questions Jase's ingenuity in creating new products they get into a debate.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertson family pulls together a family reunion to give Mia a big send-off before her surgery.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Governor's Travels
programme.desc: When the Governor of Louisiana announces that he will be coming to Duck Commander to present Willie with a commerce award, John Luke volunteers to give the introduction speech.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack and Gown
programme.desc: With Reed's graduation day approaching, Jase decides to take Reed frog hunting the night before, like he did on the day of his own graduation. Willie and Si join in, and Jase tries to keep them from imparting their "college advice" on Reed.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hands on a Woodchipper
programme.desc: When Willie agrees to sponsor Mountain Man's radio contest, a "Hands on a Hardbody" competition, he somehow finds himself competing against Si for Mountain Man's last minute prize: a woodchipper.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack Draft
programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day. Meanwhile, Phil and Si accompany Miss Kay on a trip to visit a family grave.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson Search and Rescue rookies get a chance to show their stuff while helping an injured hiker.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR uses underwater drop cameras to find a missing jet skier in the Kootenay River.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In the southern interior of British Columbia, Penticton SAR lowers a stretcher team down a steep embankment to rescue an injured driver who was thrown from his car.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whiteout conditions critically delay Pemberton SAR’s search for a lost snowmobiler. And later, surviving an avalanche!

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler Search and Rescue turns a missing out of bounds snowboarder into a crusader of mountain safety.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Rossland and Nelson Search and Rescue risk avalanche threats to recover a ski fatality in the backcountry.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson Search and Rescue rings in the New Year with three back-to-back missions.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: White water rescue rookies in Nelson BC get a taste of reality when their swift-water training course becomes an actual mission, one they will never forget.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR teams go deep for a missing subject in the Upana cave system on Vancouver Island.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR rookie Sybilla Helms is put to the test with a real mission.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In southeastern British Columbia, Nelson Search and Rescue is rescuing an overly curious canine who’s tumbled off a cliff.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 2
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lesbihonest
programme.desc: Porcha has had enough of Ivory's promiscuous behavior. He claims Porcha has more tricks and secrets than Houdini and her lying has taken its toll. Can Judge Lynn Toler help this couple or is it time for Cupid to take better aiming lessons?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Johnny on the Spot
programme.desc: Cornisha says Jawaun leaves for weeks at a time and returns broke and jobless. He says Cornisha is too bossy and picks fights causing him to blow up and take days away to cool down. Will they find a cooling point before their relationship melts down?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Game Boy
programme.desc: Christy is done with Demetrice's video game obsession! He said he's better off with his games than being accused of looking at every woman that passes by. Will Demetrice snap back into reality or is this game over?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hashtag Freaky
programme.desc: Anita says Ronald is a chronic cheater and a sex addict. He demands sex constantly and when doesn’t get his way, he admits he feels forced to seek sex outside the marriage. Can Judge Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Crazy About You
programme.desc: Mali is five years younger than his girlfriend Zay and they are total opposites. He still wants to party, and she is ready to settle down.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Out for Delivery
programme.desc: Jeanine says Marvin is cheating with co-workers and often meets up with his exes when they visit family in their hometown. He asserts she’s the one who cheated, not him, and she is so insecure she won’t stop bugging him about it.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Alpha Girl
programme.desc: Krystal is an alpha woman with a big personality and Caleb is not having it. Krystal resents him for proposing only after her father died while Caleb hates Krystal controlling their finances. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Grumpy Old Man
programme.desc: Michaela and Richard’s 30-year age difference has finally taken a toll on their relationship. Richard says he just wants to settle down and enjoy the rest of his life and says that Michaela’s constant nagging is making him rethink marrying her.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Love on Top
programme.desc: Darnesha still madly loves Pedro even though he recently had a baby with another woman and began a new relationship with a completely different woman. She wants to make it work, but Pedro is happy with his new beau. Is a divorce inevitable?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Like a Virgin
programme.desc: Emily is 29 and a virgin. The pressure from her boyfriend Romeo to have sex is overwhelming. Their 20 year age difference may be part of the problem because she chats it up more with strangers than him. Can Judge Toler help them find common ground?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prayers and Mace
programme.desc: Both brother Tim and fellow Honolulu bondsman James need Dog's help to track down their hard to find fugitives. The two cases on the docket today are challenging, especially the hunt for Gregory, a felon with a lengthy rap sheet.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Monumental Changes
programme.desc: Matt and Froy set out to repo a truck from a wealthy Texan, but their mission backfires when the Sheriff arrives with a new arrest warrant that will send Froy away for good.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Monster of a Problem
programme.desc: Sonia and Lyndah try to repossess a hot tub away from a group of upset partiers. Then, Lou and Matt try to negotiate with a pair of unintelligible and enraged parade participants. And, Lou and Lyndah must repo a car from a group of old men.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Native Operation
programme.desc: First, Matt and Lou confront an ungentlemanly drunk at an upscale gentleman's club in an effort to repossess his late-model BMW. Then, Sonia and Matt head over to the wrong side of the tracks to reclaim a motorcycle from a different kind of biker.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Get That Prowler
programme.desc: First, Lou, Sonia, and Froy unfurl an elaborate sting when they repo a taxicab by tricking its driver into picking them up. But what to do with his ferociously inebriated client? Then, Matt and Froy attempt to repo a DeLorean.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Breakdowns and Beatdowns
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy head into a bad part of town to find that their target car is owned by bat-equipped gang bangers. Then, a seemingly friendly teacher and an assistant principal nearly come to blows when Froy and Sonia come around to repossess.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Viva Las Vegas!
programme.desc: An Elvis impersonator gets Matt and Ronnie all shook up, and a ventriloquist's dummy has a nasty attitude that gets on Sonia's bad side. When Froy goes missing, Lou has to pick up the slack in a repo that goes terribly wrong.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Roll the Dice
programme.desc: When Ronnie takes the fall for losing their previous repo, Carlos tries to make amends.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Don't Spray Me with That
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Froy repossess an experimental concept motorcycle from a hose-wielding yuppie. Then, Froy and Sonia head to a casting agency to repossess a car from a two-faced receptionist with a special talent for four-letter words.

programme.title: Operation Repo: What the Truck?!?
programme.desc: After Froy bails him out from a Tijuana prison, Matt is on the warpath, and somebody needs to pay. Is this just the end of their business, or is it also the end of their friendship? Then, Lou and Sonia get an order for typical vehicle repossession...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Missed Dates
programme.desc: First, Lyndah is put in a tough situation - she has to control a sobbing, cop-calling debtor and turn away Frankie's unwanted and inappropriate advances - all at the same time. Then, Matt and Froy have two problems on their hands.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Inappropriate Website Episode
programme.desc: When Nick lands on a porn website due to a spelling error, a co-worker takes it the wrong way, forcing KAWT employees to undergo sensitivity training.

programme.title: The Game: Parental Guidance Suggested
programme.desc: Tasha tells Melanie that she has to find a place of her own in a month. Derwin calls Melanie's parents and informs them about their breakup, causing Melanie to get upset.

programme.title: The Game: Media Blitz
programme.desc: Malik becomes the whopping boy for a cartoonist after making a politically incorrect statement. Things take a change for the worse when Malik tries to make amends and ends up punching the cartoonist.

programme.title: The Game: The Truth Hurts

programme.title: The Game: Turkey Basting Bitches
programme.desc: Melanie gets a job waitressing at a coffee shop. Meanwhile, Derwin, enjoying his new single superstar status, decides to start dating a new girl, named Raquel.

programme.title: The Game: The Ghost Of Derwin Past
programme.desc: Dionne ditches sympathetic Melanie, who decided to stay in San Diego after learning that Dionne would be spending Christmas alone, after she learns that an endorsement opportunity she pitched for Derwin has been resurrected.

programme.title: The Game: Je-Rome Wasn't Built In A Day

programme.title: The Game: Take These Vows And Shove 'Em

programme.title: The Game: The List Episode
programme.desc: Tasha tries on take on Serena Williams as a client. Meanwhile, Malik schools Derwin on the type of women he should date.

programme.title: The Game: White Men Can't Jump, But They're Definitely Packing

programme.title: The Game: The Commitments
programme.desc: As things heat up with Jerome, Melanie decides to pull back, afraid of commitment, but after running into Derwin and his new interest, Melanie decides it's time to commit, but later finds Jerome with another woman.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Invitation to Evil
programme.desc: Paula and her husband Mike are under siege by a purported shadow demon in their North Carolina home. Paula has witnessed a toddler bed levitating and heard deep growls. Michelle, Ryan and the team uncover the shocking truth behind the haunting.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Fury
programme.desc: Kathy, her two daughters and her new husband, "Farmer" thought they had the perfect, quiet life deep in the mountains of West Virginia.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Do Bad Things

programme.title: Paranormal State: Satan's Soldier
programme.desc: Mark and Kim can't sleep through the racket caused by unseen forces in their central Indiana home. When PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger discover what appears to be blood in the basement, they investigate a history of violence in the home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Woman in the Window
programme.desc: Ryan and his team lend paranormal assistance to a family who lives in a historic home that was once a part of the Underground Railroad. Does the answer to their haunting lie in the mysterious tunnels beneath the house?

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Sickness

programme.title: Paranormal State: Smoke and Shadows

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vendetta
programme.desc: P.R.S. investigates claims of supernatural revenge in the Pennsylvania Poconos. When a client's new boyfriend moves in, does the paranormal move in with him? Or did her ex put a hex on her house and the entire family?

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Haunted Piano
programme.desc: Ryan and the PRS team are called in when unlucky antique collectors unwittingly bring a paranormally-infested piano into their home. The team attempts to dismantle and destroy the offending instrument.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Permission To Do Harm

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Doncaster Air Museum Pt2

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison Pt1

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison Pt2

programme.title: Survivors With Denise Welch
programme.desc: Sammy was 14 when she met Arshid Hussain in 1999. Hussain was the leader of a sex ring and was jailed for 35 years in 2016 for 23 offences involving nine women. Sammy finally got away from Hussain when he was imprisoned in 2001 for a violent offence.

programme.title: Survivors With Denise Welch
programme.desc: Adele Bellis was left with permanent scarring, partially bald, and without her right ear when Jason Harrison threw sulphuric acid at her. This was at the request of her violent and emotionally abusive ex-boyfriend, Anthony Riley.

programme.title: Survivors With Denise Welch

programme.title: Dynasty: The Secret

programme.title: Dynasty: The Letter

programme.title: Dynasty: The Ball

programme.title: World's Greatest: Volcanic Islands
programme.desc: They've been worshiped and feared over the millennia. But in the wake of drama and destruction, the elements give rise to cultures and nations so beautiful that we've come to know them as the world's greatest volcanic islands.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Global Cities
programme.desc: Travel to the centers of wealth, power, industry, and innovation. From London to Tokyo, Hong Kong to New York, these are the cities that never sleep. The influence held in these economic hubs unites the global community.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Lost Cities
programme.desc: Once powerful and populous centers of influence, these lost cities are providing clues to how our ancestors existed in the world and remind us that ancient civilizations were not so far removed from our own.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Capital Cities
programme.desc: With visionaries, politicians, and activists, these metropolises are defined as the official seats of government. Dublin, Washington, and Taipei share broad avenues, museums, and monuments, but are as varied as the countries they represent.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Deserts
programme.desc: For all their reputation as inhospitable places, deserts are full of incredible plants and animals that have adapted to the climate. They are bursting with geological wonders that inspire and are home to some of the most life in the world.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'S Library Card/Arthur's Big Hit
programme.desc: When D.W. discovers that she can get her own library card, she rejoices at the world of books waiting for her. And, is it ever okay to hit someone? Sometimes you just get so mad, you wanna....pow! Right??

programme.title: Arthur: Lend Me Your Ear/The Butler Did It
programme.desc: Arthur, Buster, and Brain are worried when Mr. Ratburn isn't acting like himself. He's always pleased to see them, so what’s made him change? When Mr. Crosswire gets a robot butler for Father's Day, Muffy fears Bailey may be replaced.

programme.title: Arthur: MacFrensky/The Good The Bad and the Binky
programme.desc: Cheating comes in to play when Francine and Brain are locked in a stiff competition to win student of the month. Babysitter Binky introduces his charge to the world of pro-wrestling, but is he being a good role model?

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Sells Out/Mind Your Manners
programme.desc: To earn the money for a new video game, Arthur decides to sell his old toys through his school's Web site. The Tibble Twins want to take Grandmother out to dinner, but she'd rather stay home. Is it because of their terrible table manners?

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Babysits/Arthur's Cousin Catastrophe
programme.desc: You think running a marathon is hard? Try babysitting for the Terrible Tibble Twins. Next, Arthur's family is hosting the once-a-year-is-more-than-enough family reunion. But a major thunderstorm turns this into a reunion to remember.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'s Snow Mystery/Team Trouble
programme.desc: D.W. saves everything. But her most prized possession is a snowball from last winter. But now it’s disappeared! Then, Arthur, Francine, and Buster must do a report on ancient Rome--but can they work as a team to complete the assignment?

programme.title: Arthur: April 9th
programme.desc: April 9th is a normal day until a fire destroys the teacher's lounge and forces Lakewood Elementary to close. This unexpected event finds creates a wide range of emotional reactions, for Arthur, his friends and teachers, and the community.

programme.title: Arthur: Portrait of the Artist as a Young Tibble/The Secret Guardians
programme.desc: The Tibble Twins start a new business to earn enough money to buy the coveted Krummy Kreepy Kastle. When and friends stumble upon a beautiful woodland oasis right by their homes, they vow to tell no one and keep it as their secret spot.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Writes A Story/Arthur's Lost Dog
programme.desc: Struggling with a school assignment, Arthur decides that his regular life is just too boring to write about. And, Arthur is the only one who believes in the superior intelligence of his dog. But even Arthur gets confused when Pal runs away.

programme.title: Secret War: Hardy Amies and Operation Ratweek
programme.desc: Operation Ratweek’s existence has always been denied. However WMR has now discovered evidence that it existed and was carried out.

programme.title: Secret War: The Special Interrogation Group
programme.desc: The SIG consisted of German speaking Jewish volunteers from Palestine. They had a highly dangerous job: which was to pose as Germans behind enemy lines and extract intelligence and do acts of sabotage. Few had a long-life expectancy.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: In this programme we bring the RAF story into the modern era. Another aircraft to have extended the RAF’s capabilities is the C130 Hercules. This aircraft has proved its capabilities in countless environments from resupply, to dropping paratroopers.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: The RAF’s maritime role is often overlooked. Between the wars the RAF operated elegant flying boats to patrol the far flung corners of the Empire.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Luis has fallen for a single mum, and now he's ready to take their online relationship to the next level. But first Nev and Max must help him make sure that she is who she says she is! (S5, ep19)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: David is the only love Andria has ever known. Love letters and voice messages make Andria stay. But having never met after 10 years, she needs to know what he is hiding that keeps him away.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Kim & Matt
programme.desc: Kim's been pouring her heart out to Matt for over 10 years. Now, Kim's facing a life-changing decision - should she marry her current boyfriend or find out if Matt is her soul mate? (S1, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Tyreme met the beautiful Tomorrow online over 9 months ago. Tyreme is ready to uproot his life to be with her. Will Nev and Max be able help Tyreme finally meet his Tomorrow? (S5, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: When Kayla was two, her father committed suicide. Years later, Kayla is sent a message from Courtney, a woman claiming to be channeling her dead father's spirit. (S5, ep10)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Max and co-host iO Tillett Wright help Mecca connect with a boy she's loved for years. But soon it's discovered that Mecca's digital beau may be using her pictures to catfish others! (S6, ep6)

programme.title: The City: Unexpected Roommates
programme.desc: Adam kicks Jay out of his apartment so Allie can move in &amp; Jay asks Whitney if he can live with her. Erin's plan to juggle two guys backfires &amp; leaves her alone on New Year's Eve. (S1, ep9)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Going to Italia

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Like More than a Friend
programme.desc: Deena & Pauly consider the consequences should they hook up. The Situation tries to take his friendship with Snooki to the next level. Ron & Sammi try to be friends but old habits die hard. (S4, ep2)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Twinning
programme.desc: With twins in the mix, it's double trouble as bi-curious Deena pulls the robbery on both The Situation and Vinny. Plus, The Situation's 'secret hook-up' with Snooki is revealed. (S4, ep3)

programme.desc: Jenni and Angelina finally bury the hatchet, and the gang takes a nostalgia-filled trip back to Seaside Heights.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: DNA on one of two teenage girls killed in a similar fashion on a California beach six years apart leads investigators to a suspect who worked inside the police department.

programme.title: 48 Hours

programme.title: 48 Hours: Terror at the Morgue
programme.desc: Dr. O.C. Smith, a medical examiner, was apparently attacked on June 1, 2002, as he was leaving work. He was found wrapped in barbed wire with a bomb strapped to his neck. Dr. Smith survived but expressed concern that his assailant might attack again

programme.title: 48 Hours: Tacoma Confidential

programme.title: South Park starts at 9pm
programme.desc: CHANNEL STARTS AT 9PM Follow everyone's favorite troublemakers—Stan, Kyle, Cartman, and Kenny--from the very beginning of their unforgettable adventures.

programme.title: South Park: Mr. Hankey the Christmas Poo
programme.desc: Mr Hankey, The Christmas Poo: The Mayor decides to impose a holiday theme which won't offend anybody. Kyle tries to convince everyone that Mr Hankey (a singing Christmas poo) exists. (S1, E09)

programme.title: South Park: Tom's Rhinoplasty

programme.title: South Park: Mecha Streisand
programme.desc: Mecha-Streisand: Cartman and Kyle fall out over a magic triangle they un-earth on an archaeological dig. The triangle yields the power to turn Barbra Streisand into a terrible monster. (S1, E12)

programme.title: South Park: Cartman's Mom is a Dirty S**t (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cartman's Mum Is A Dirty S**t (1): Dr. Mephisto helps Cartman un-cover the truth about his dad's identity. The spotlight is on quite a few of South Park's male residents. Who could it be? (S1, E13)

programme.title: South Park: Cartman's Mom Is Still A Dirty S**t (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cartman's Mum Is Still A Dirty S**t (2): Dr Mephisto is shot before he reveals who Cartman's father is. Who exactly shot him? Meanwhile, the rest of the town try to deal with a blizzard. (S2, E02)

programme.title: South Park: Chickenlover

programme.title: South Park: Ike's Wee Wee
programme.desc: Ike's Wee Wee: Kyle misunderstands what circumcision is and thinks he has to save Ike's penis from being cut off! Mr. Mackey is fired, and turns to drugs - &quot;drugs are bad, m'kay?&quot; (S2, E04)

programme.title: South Park: Conjoined Fetus Lady
programme.desc: Conjoined Fetus Lady: Kyle is terrified because he has to see the school nurse, who has a scary deformity. Meanwhile, the school dodgeball team goes to China - only Pip can save them now. (S2, E05)

programme.title: South Park: The Mexican Staring Frog of Southern Sri Lanka
programme.desc: The Mexican Staring Frog Of Southern Sri Lanka: After being duped by Stan's Uncle Jimbo, the boys decide to take revenge by making bogus videos of a certain frog. Will Jesus stand for this? (S2, E06)

programme.title: South Park: City on the Edge of Forever
programme.desc: City On The Edge Of Forever: The school bus ends up perched on the edge of a ravine after it crashes in a snowstorm. Must be time for some flashbacks then! Can these memories be trusted? (S2, E07)

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is putting up some new signs in Sunflower Valley to help people find their way round the valley. Meanwhile Dizzy has been asked by Ela Stevenson if she’ll be the ‘walking bus’ and help the children get to school.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Scrambler to the Rescue
programme.desc: Its winter in Sunflower Valley and Bob and his team are building a concert hall in time for a special winter celebration. Scrambler is especially keen to help – but is frustrated that there’s nothing for an energetic quad-bike to do!

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: After a stormy night, Wendy has to mend a chimney pot at Mrs Potts’, while Bob repairs a drainage pipe for Farmer Pickles. A wire fence has been blown away at the farm too, but fixing the pipe takes priority.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: A disembodied mutant takes over the bodies of various people and sets out to go after the ones who did this to him. One of them is a doctor that Shalimar likes.

programme.title: Mutant X

programme.title: Mutant X

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Emancipation
programme.desc: A group posing as volunteers attacks using a stolen skrill prototype that does not require an implant to control. It is discovered that the skrill queen is also missing. The investigation leads to a resistance group called Black Wednesday.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Déjà Vu
programme.desc: A joint Doors International/Taelon venture creates a machine that allows people to vividly relive a memory, but Liam suspects a back alley version of the device is leading to the death of some users.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Once and Future World
programme.desc: Artifacts believed to be Taelon are found in South America. Renee and Liam try to beat Sandoval to the source to determine the importance of the found pieces.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Thicker than Blood
programme.desc: An old business partner of Augur's is hired by Da'an to get information about the Resistance, resulting in the death of many members. Meanwhile, Sandoval finds out he has a life threatening blood disorder.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: A Little Bit of Heaven
programme.desc: Liam and Renee investigate a dead pregnant woman missing her fetus. They discover a town that Da'an helped after a nuclear meltdown and a suspicious brother and sister who were part of an early experiment to combine human and Taelon DNA.

programme.title: The Lost World: A Witch's Calling

programme.title: The Lost World: Brothers in Arms
programme.desc: Malone is pierced by a poison dart from a Keeran blowdart. Under the influence of the hallucinogenic poison, Malone relives his nightmarish experience as a battlefield correspondent in WWI.

programme.title: The Lost World: Ice Age
programme.desc: A new Ice Age threatens the ecosystem. The explorers investigate the site of a meteor crash and try to help a woman. Not knowing who she is, they are targeted by her cold-blooded subjects.

programme.title: The Lost World: The End Game
programme.desc: The intractable Death comes to settle her score with Lord Roxton. In a series of games, Roxton plays Death in an attempt to keep his life, as well as the lives of his friends.

programme.title: The Lost World: Phantoms

programme.title: Teen Mom UK

programme.title: Teen Mom UK

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: The Mums are back. Mia is in a rollercoaster new relationship while Sassi deals with heartbreak and loneliness. Amber struggles with a Threenager, while Chloe spies her dream home. (S9, ep1)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: A near death experience leaves Amber and the boys homeless. Parents evening causes strife for Sassi and Darren. Chloe and Jordan's world falls apart. (S9, ep3)

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A report on the 2009 death of Rhonda Casto, who went hiking in Oregon’s Columbia River Gorge with her boyfriend, Stephen Nichols, and she never returned home.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Precious Angels
programme.desc: A report on the brutal murders in a Dallas, Texas suburb of Darlie and Darin Routier’s two sons -- Devon, 6 and Damon, 5. Darlie who claims that the boys were killed by an intruder, suffered serious knife wounds to her throat.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Colonel's Wife
programme.desc: Ret. Col. George Maracek, a 69-year-old former Green Beret who served in Korea and Vietnam, has been charged with the 1991 murder of his Thai wife Viparet. He maintains that he is innocent.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The One Who Got Away
programme.desc: A report about how serial killer Andrew Urdiales was identified, arrested and convicted, and about the young woman who became the only one of his victims to survive.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Two Wigs, A Gun, and A Murder: Part 1
programme.desc: Fred Jablin, a devoted father was gunned down in his driveway. His ex-wife, Piper was the prime suspect. Circumstantial evidence, including an airline ticket and two wigs indicated that Piper had masqueraded as her older sister and killed her husband.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Two Wigs, A Gun, and A Murder: Part 2
programme.desc: Fred Jablin, a devoted father was gunned down in his driveway. His ex-wife, Piper was the prime suspect. Circumstantial evidence, including an airline ticket and two wigs indicated that Piper had masqueraded as her older sister and killed her husband.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: F.B.I. Agent Dale Cooper comes to the logging town of Twin Peaks to investigate the murder of Laura Palmer, a beautiful and popular high school student. While investigating, Agent Cooper slowly learns that strange things are happening.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: The next morning, Cooper meets with Audrey, who confesses to leaving him the note about One Eyed Jacks. Cooper tells Truman he can't remember who the killer was in his dream, but insists the dream is a code to solving the crime.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Cooper questions Dr. Jacoby, who suspects Leo Johnson is the killer. Cooper's supervisor, Gordon Cole, calls in with Albert's report. Josie Packard spies on Ben Horne and Catherine Martell. Hawk tracks down the One Armed Man.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Cooper and company have tea with the Log Lady. The Log Lady tells them there was a third man following after Leo and Jacques the night Laura died. At Jacques Renault's cabin Cooper, Hawk, and Truman find Waldo the bird.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Audrey cons her way into working at the perfume counter where Laura worked. She discovers that it's being used as a recruitment post for One Eyed Jacks. James, Donna and Maddy plan to lure Jacoby away from his office.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Audrey is hired at One Eyed Jacks, but is caught in a trap when her father arrives. Cooper gets Jacques Renault to reveal the details of Laura's last night in the cabin. Deputy Andy saves Truman's life and apprehends Renault.
